title: How to solve "torch.cuda.FloatTensor doesn't implement stateless method range"?
body_html:
Hello

When I was working on my code with GPU mode(using cuda) I got an error saying like below

"torch.cuda.FloatTensor doesn't implement stateless method range"?

It seems like pytorch GPU mode does not supports torch.range, since when I changed to CPU mode no error was occurred.

Then what should be the solution in order to use range in GPU mode?

Thanks in advance
body_text:
